typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source3
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source4
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSaleCustomerAdress
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source6
source1, CloudSaleCustomerAdress join(source1@CustomerID == CloudSaleCustomerAdress@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
source2, source6 join(source2@CustomerID == source6@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join1 derive(CreatedDate = iif(source1@CreatedDate>CloudSaleCustomerAdress@CreatedDate, source1@CreatedDate, CloudSaleCustomerAdress@CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = iif(source1@UpdatedDate>CloudSaleCustomerAdress@UpdatedDate, source1@UpdatedDate, CloudSaleCustomerAdress@UpdatedDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Join2 derive(CreatedDate = iif(source2@CreatedDate>source6@CreatedDate, source2@CreatedDate, source6@CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = iif(source2@UpdatedDate>source6@UpdatedDate, source2@UpdatedDate, source6@UpdatedDate)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = source1@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = source2@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(SourceSystemID = 1) ~> DerivedColumn3
source3 derive(SourceSystemID = 3) ~> DerivedColumn4
source4 derive(SourceSystemID = 2) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn3, DerivedColumn4 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union2, DerivedColumn5 union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union3 derive(GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn6
DerivedColumn6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> sink1
